Docs.param: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, .
to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, .
to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, .
to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, .
The current format string of the cell.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the .
Docs.returns: A that represents the value of the cell to copy to the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 值而定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，此控制項呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法來擷取剪貼簿格式的值，表示儲存格。
這個方法的位置相關參數指出此儲存格中表示的區域中選取的資料格所定義之資料的資料表中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。 根據儲存格的位置格式設定資訊可能會傳回這個方法，除了儲存格的值。 例如，資料列的第一個資料行中的資料格的 HTML 格式將會包含表示資料列開頭的標記。
支援剪貼簿格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> 類別。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating which sort glyph is displayed.
Docs.value: A值，代表目前的字符。 預設值為 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個屬性會自動設定使用的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>。 您必須將此屬性自己時所具有的資料行排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>中的程式設計排序屬性。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

Docs.exception: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

When setting this property, the value of either the property or the property of the cell is . -or- When changing the value of this property, the specified value is not and the value of the property of the owning column is .
